name: Desert Survival (CasaNuestra)
description:
A top down shooter that takes place in a desert. You have 3 lives to avoid cacti and enemies and to survive as long as possible and to kill as many enemies as you can. WASD to move and left click to shoot. Score in top right is how many enemies you've killed. Score in bottom right is seconds you've survived. The number above your head indicates how many lives you have. Every upgrade you get makes your weapon fire more bullets but makes your aim worse so pick them up carefully.

MAC DOES NOT WORK
